column2: "This one ye will be facing is \"Magatsu\". 'tis one part the Demon sealed by the Stars."
"'tis only a leak of its power, but, nothing short of extraordinary. Prayeth thou be cautious."
"There art \"Gates\" impeding his advance, but they wilt not last forever."
"'t musn't be alloweth to break through the final \"Gate\". May that happen, all will be lost."
"Of course, there be a last resort, but t'would be best not to use it."
"\"Magatsu\" be not the only enemy. The \"Kuronite Illusions\" it summons, may also attack."
"I shalt confer blessing, when ye are ready. Help ye directly, I am unable."
"Mine apologies, rely on ye, I must. Please, lend me thy power."
